text: @NYPDShea @NYPDFIRSTDEP @NYPDTransit @NYPDTransport @NYPDHousing @NYPDChiefofDept @NYPDChiefPatrol @NYPDnews @NYPDDetectives @NYPDDCA I’m an ER doctor. We have lost a whole lot of our frontline hospital brothers and sisters from #COVID19 but you sure as heck don’t see us covering our ID badges to mourn them. Find another way to honor your dead brothers and sisters, especially now.

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
